fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
-Digital Single Market Strategy including EU Copyright reform 
-Management of Copyright and Related Rights 
-Copyright in the Information Society 
-Term of Protection 
-Orphan Works 
-Cloud Computing
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: NGO status in WIPO (World Intellectual Property Organization). Therefore AEPO-ARTIS participates in WIPO meetings with intellectual property relevance.
goals__remit:
AEPO-ARTIS represents 36 European collective management societies for performers from 26 countries in Europe. 
In total, these organisations gather some 400.000 performers as members.
